solution_line_template: She drinks {bottles_per_day} bottle a day and there are {bottles_per_case} bottles in a case so a case will last {bottles_per_case}/{bottles_per_day} = <<{bottles_per_case}/{bottles_per_day}={days_per_case}>>{days_per_case} days

She needs enough to last her {total_days} days and 1 case will last her {days_per_case} days so she needs {total_days}/{days_per_case} = <<{total_days}/{days_per_case}={cases_needed}>>{cases_needed} cases
Each case is on sale for ${price_per_case} and she needs {cases_needed} cases so that's {price_per_case}*{cases_needed} = $<<{price_per_case}*{cases_needed}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
